channel.title: Pages on Fahim Dalvi
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Fahim Dalvi

item.title: Projects
item.description: Live Speech Translation Bilingual Arabic and English transcription and translation platform with a robust backend enabling live broadcastable sessions React NodeJS MongoDB Nginx Puppeteer Artillery.io Machine Translation API Distributed backend managing multiple machine translation engines built at QCRI and a simple to use user-facing REST API. Served over 400K requests from 30+ countries so far! Python React NodeJS MongoDB Grommet More to come!

item.title: Research
item.description: Minimalism is not a lack of something. It’s simply the perfect amount of something. — Nicholas Burroughs
